page.title: 09BARCLAYS BANK
page.content: The{Barclays Bank}employs 12 people. Mr Partridge is the bank manager who started working there in 1974.There has been a branch in the Deepings since 1900.The bank provides over 200 services concerned with financial aid and advice. They use plastic money(creditcards) such as Barclaycards.They also have young savers accounts in which you can put your pocket money and take it out when it's required. They are a service industry without which commerce and industry could not function at a very competitive price. The coins are counted by scales but the notes are counted by hand.In the future they are hoping to have a cash dispenser.
